pages.title: In Minecraft
pages.text: An oak is the most common tree in the game, found in a variety of biomes and available in several variants. Oaks come in several variants with different properties.

pages.title: On Earth
pages.text: Oaks are hardwood trees or shrubs in the genus Quercus of the beech family. They have spirally arranged leaves, often with lobed edges, and a nut called an acorn. It is widely distributed in the Northern Hemisphere. Ecologically, oaks are keystone species in habitats from Mediterranean semi-desert to subtropical rainforest.
